resources:
AndroidAtWork
Overlay permission is required to draw the the UI after phone unlock during Intervention phase #1. Click below to test what the screen looks like.
# ESM on pickup / after continued use Why are you using your phone right now? Please select one option from each group If you skip more than six ESMs each day, that day wont be counted towards study completion! Next skip will stop further ESMs for today
What are you doing on your phone right now? Please select the last options before you stopped using your phone
Step 1 Examples Step 2: What is the primary purpose of this activity? Step 3 Examples
Communication: Calls, messaging, emails, social networking\n Entertainment/Leisure: Browsing, gaming, news, videos, social media scrolling\n Tools & Utilities: Camera, checking time, calendar, weather, payments, navigation, system settings\n Other/Unconscious Habit: Accidental unlock, habit, etc.
Mainly work-related / Mainly personal / A mix of both (work and personal) / Not applicable (e.g., in the case of “Other” in Step 1)
External Nudge: Notification, Call, Alert, etc. \n Inner Motivation: Thought, Habit, Curiosity, etc. \n No specific reason: accidental activation
What was the reason you stopped using your phone just now? What was the last thing you did before you stopped using your phone?
Device id: %s
WorkTimeSelectorActivity ScreenOffQuestionnaire
This application tracks foreground application changes when you are using your smartphone.
